item.description:
The Cambridge Innovation Center will be the host site for WE ARE THE JOBS event and rally. EO will be hosting this program and have invited us to bring our entire BIMM membership if we can!

Our program will feature three leading experts who will show us how we can best utilize social media to gain awareness, leverage our assets, and grow our business.

DYNAMITE SPEAKERS:

Erik Qualman-Socialnomics – www.socialnomics.net

Bettina Hein - Pixability. (Video Marketing for Dummies) www.pixability.com

Laura Fitton - Hubspot (Twitter for Dummies) www.hubspot.com

Upon completion of our discussion and live streaming of our program worldwide, we will utilize the best practices and go outside for our "We Are The Jobs" rally to be videotaped, tweeted and promoted using social media.

The rally will be followed by a networking reception with beers and food at the Venture Cafe; located at the Cambridge Innovation Center.

*Please sign up both here at MEETUP and use this eventbrite site link: http://wearethejobs.e... to register so there will be enough room for everyone who wants to hear these speakers. Great opportunity. No cost. Just your time.

Bring a sign!!
item.name: Special Meetup Opportunity with powerhouse speakers for our members
